channel.title: Reflection on Gabe's Gulch
channel.description: Recent content in Reflection on Gabe's Gulch

item.title: Reflection - Atlas Shrugged
item.description:
I have finally finished Atlas Shrugged and would like to take a moment to reflect on my interpretation of some of the concepts and or idealogies portrayed throughout the book.

What idealogies and or philosophy is portrayed?

  • Rationalism. What does rationalism even mean?
  • Individualism. What is this?

Economic

  • Connection to Hayek.
